https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/7y6N4M4PRmsFKjmjZyVJzYcC4cy.jpg The Devil himself comes to Earth to open his own church and the world becomes a pandemonium of delights and confusions. Based on a short story by Machado de Assis, the most famous realistic Brazilian writer of the XIX century. A Comédia Divina
